segments.text: I keep replaying this scene in my mind, wondering what will happen next.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sheer volume of water cascading from the sink is just incredible.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost hear the soft splash as it hits the growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman’s complete detachment from her surroundings is truly bizarre.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s standing in a flood, yet her focus is solely on that dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the children are engaged in their own risky business.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool looks like it’s about to collapse any second, I worry.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me angry that the adult isn't paying attention to the hazards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine the crash if that boy falls, or if someone slips on the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole thing could turn into quite a disaster very quickly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang of sadness for the beautiful, calm garden outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It highlights how much turmoil is contained within these walls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This situation makes me incredibly uncomfortable to witness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I just want to shout a warning to the woman.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a chaotic mess, all unfolding in silent slow motion.
segments.speaker: PAR
